ValidationRule.description: When the initial reason for contact is Information or Advice then the Category, Topic, and What is the Question? fields are all mandatory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Initial_Reason_For_Contact__c,"Info or Advice or Confirmation") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Club Eurostar")) && OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Category__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Topic__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(What_Is_The_Question__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select options from the "Category", "Topic", and "What Is The Question?" fields to continue
